scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:semantic-ui && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:webpack
scripts.// start: Use nodemon to monitor JS changes, and start an webpack-dev asset server in parallel.
scripts.start: PORT=5000 nodemon -e js,jsx server/server.js & node server/webpack-dev-server.js
scripts.// deploy: Depoly steps, which creates a branch named _deploy, builds and commits compiled project, and pushes to Heroku.
scripts.deploy:commit: _COMMIT_MSG=$(git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'%h - %s') && git add .gitignore client/build tmp/webpack-stats.json && git commit -m "$_COMMIT_MSG"
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:init && npm run build && npm run deploy:commit && npm run deploy:push && npm run deploy:cleanup
